title: Shah Rukh Khan, Sohail Khan and Sanjay Dutt to own cricket teams of retired players
text: Shah Rukh Khan, Sohail Khan and Sanjay Dutt to own cricket teams of retired players Saturday, 24 October 2015 (4 minutes ago) When Shah Rukh Khan, Sohail Khan and Sanjay Dutt were offered to come on board as the owners of three cricket teams in a new league, the trio wasted no time in giving their nod. Salman Khan, Aamir Khan Exclusive Dance KICK Arpita Khan Wedding Recent related news Sources claim that both the actors have shown keen interest in owning a franchise in the upcoming league Earlier, Bollywood and politics walked hand in hand. Bollywood Life 2 hours ago - India Bollywood actor Sanjay Dutt, who is currently serving his jail term after being convicted in the 1993 bomb blasts, has bought a franchise in the UAE-based...
